snippet.title: QUESTER : A story that explores the truth of the lost world.
snippet.description:
QUESTER, a hack&slash, dungeon crawler RPG created by Kazushi Hagiwara, has opened a Kickstarter today. Please help us contintue creating this unique indie game!

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1000games/hack-and-slash-rpg-quester-english-translation

-----

"QUESTER" is a dungeon exploration RPG specializing in hack-and-slash gameplay.

Experience the futuristic post-apocalyptic world created by manga artist Kazushi Hagiwara

Enjoy a deep game system designed by Hironori Kato

Feel the excitement and surprise of '80s PC games.

Support for Windows® 10 and Windows® 11 64bit

Full of challenging elements! Featuring 24 characters (8 classes), a large number of armaments that can be modified, skills that provide satisfying combos, a creature library, a NEW GAME+ mode to enjoy finishing side quests, and more.

[STEAM] https://store.steampowered.com/app/1754460/QUESTER/

[ONLINE MANUAL] https://www.thousandgames.net/quester/indies-version-eng/help/
